heading: Content Block 1
summary: BRAȘOVHave you arrived in Brașov and need help?Find information on how to manage in a new city and who can help you.

heading: Content Block 2
summary: Important contactsIntegration Center for Migrants Brașov:migrantbrasov@gmail.com/contact@migrantbrasov.ro. Monday - Friday: 09:00 - 17:00Brașov County Immigration Service:bv.igi@mai.gov.ro/0268-409956, 0268-409955, 0268-409759, 0268-409953, 0268-409957.Emergency call number: 112National Anti-Traffic Hotline Romania ✆ 0800 800 678 / 021 313 3100

heading: Content Block 9
summary: Women's CenterIf you need support in accessing reproductive health services  as well as support in navigating the health system or you need services dedicated to victims of domestic violence, click here.Ask for help

heading: Content Block 10
summary: Counseling for people living with HIVIf you arrive in Romania and need free, anonymous and confidential psycho-medical-social HIV services, you can receive the support of specialist doctors from 10 Regional HIV Centers in Romania, the expertise and support of Sens Pozitiv.Ask for help
